general_provisions: This bill addresses drivers without a driver license, driving privilege card, or learner permit.
hilighted_provisions: This bill:<hr><ltbullet>defines terms; <hr><ltbullet>modifies the circumstances in which law enforcement is required to impound a vehicle;<hr><ltbullet>addresses identification of an individual who operates a vehicle without a valid driving credential;<hr><ltbullet>allows certain fees to be waived in certain circumstances;<hr><ltbullet>modifies certain fees;<hr><ltbullet>amends certain penalties associated with driving without a driver license; <hr><ltbullet>requires a vendor providing software service for a fingerprint device to ensure the software is compatible with law enforcement database software; and<hr><ltbullet>makes technical changes.
